The League has added Zombie Pipeline to our library. After writing a quick review, I sort of recommended it. Dev

A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The phrases “Mandaral” and “I hate cats!” seem to be frequently repeated. Well, it is an adaptation of the Stephen King book so maybe its not THAT surprising there is some repetition involved.
This was greatly dramatised from the original story by Rita Monteros Negrete of Omnip
